meanings.sent1: Her overrefinement in choosing the perfect font for the poster delayed the project.
meanings.sent2: The overrefinement of the cake decorations made them too delicate to handle.
meanings.sent3: His overrefinement in organizing his closet led to color-coding his socks.
meanings.sent4: The overrefinement of her speech resembled a carefully crafted piece of art.
meanings.sent5: The overrefinement of the garden design left no room for natural beauty.

meanings.definition: The act of refining something excessively.
meanings.sent1: The overrefinement of the essay made it lose its original message.
meanings.sent2: His overrefinement of the car engine caused more problems than it solved.
meanings.sent3: The overrefinement of the recipe resulted in a dish no one could recognize.
meanings.sent4: The overrefinement of the plan turned a simple task into a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The overrefinement of the painting left no room for spontaneity or creativity.
